name: Maria Elena Rodriguez
title: CEO & Founder
bio: Maria Elena is a serial entrepreneur and investor who has built three successful startups bridging Mexican and Silicon Valley markets. She currently leads TechMexico Ventures, a $100M fund focused on cross-border technology investments.

name: David Chen
title: Partner
bio: David leads a16z's Latin America investments and has been instrumental in connecting Silicon Valley capital with emerging Mexican tech companies. He has invested in over 50 startups across the region.

name: Carlos Dominguez
title: CTO
bio: Carlos has been at the forefront of Mexico's fintech revolution, leading the technical vision at Clip, one of Mexico's most successful unicorns. He previously worked at Google and Stripe.

name: Sofia Alarcon
title: VP of Engineering
bio: Sofia leads Uber's Latin America engineering team from Silicon Valley, overseeing products used by millions across Mexico. She's passionate about building inclusive tech teams.
